SummaryEnglish: Hosuke Sharaku is a survivor of a three-eyed tribe that once built an ancient civilization. He usually looks like an innocent child with a patch on his forehead, but once the patch comes off to reveal his third eye, he is transformed into a wild hero. This is an amazing adventure romance in which Sharaku challenges ancient mysteries with his psychic powers and ancient wisdom.

1.TitleEnglish: Debut of the Three-eyed Boy: I am Sharaku
1.SummaryEnglish: While his big bandage is on his forehead, Sharaku Hosuke is a coward and is always being bullied by everyone in the class. But he has changed ever since he saw an image of God with a cross on its forehead at the museum. A secret seems to be hidden under that big bandage.
